title: Price drop: Top up your Apple Watch anywhere with a wireless keychain charger
description: Never risk a low battery again with this Apple Watch wireless charger keychain, just $14.97 for a limited time! (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: Never risk a low battery again with this Apple Watch wireless charger keychain, just $14.97 for a limited time!
text: Deals With this tiny charger by your side, you don't need to worry about your Apple Watch running out of juice. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals Always on the go and always trying to close your Apple Watch rings? This wireless keychain charger for Apple Watch is a game-changer for your active lifestyle. Small yet packed with power, this pocket-size Apple Watch charger is on sale now for only $14.97. That’s 70% off its regular price of $49.95. Don’t run out of juice at a critical moment If you’re one of the millions of people who wear your Apple Watch everywhere (including to bed), the device’s relatively short battery life can be a pain. This keychain charger makes it easy to keep your Apple Watch up and running, without a clunky wire and/or power adapter. Sporting a sleek design that easily fits in your pocket, purse or backpack, this 950mAh powerhouse ensures that your Apple Watch stays charged wherever life takes you. Imagine going for a jog, attending a meeting or jetting off on a spontaneous weekend getaway. With this on your keychain or stowed away in a bag, you’ll have peace of mind knowing your Apple Watch will stay powered up and ready for action without needing to carry a heftier charger. Thanks to its magnetic center ring, you’ll get an incredibly convenient wireless charging experience. The magnet ensures your Apple Watch stays securely in place. Plus, you can even charge the charger itself while it’s charging your Apple Watch. That’s the kind of nifty little touch that makes life simpler and more convenient. Save on a highly rated keychain Apple Watch charger This nifty device comes highly rated, earning 4.2 out of 5 stars from verified buyers in the Cult of Mac Deals store. As one user raved, “This pocket-sized charger is so accessible and works great … I carry it in my purse or attach it to my backpack, depending on where I go.” This wireless charging keychain can juice up all Apple Watch models. Never risk a low battery again. Grab this Apple Watch wireless charger keychain for just $14.97 for a limited time. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post on the Apple Watch keychain charger on December 4, 2023. We updated the pricing.
html:
• Deals

Always on the go and always trying to close your Apple Watch rings? This wireless keychain charger for Apple Watch is a game-changer for your active lifestyle.

Small yet packed with power, this pocket-size Apple Watch charger is on sale now for only $14.97. That’s 70% off its regular price of $49.95.

Don’t run out of juice at a critical moment

If you’re one of the millions of people who wear your Apple Watch everywhere (including to bed), the device’s relatively short battery life can be a pain. This keychain charger makes it easy to keep your Apple Watch up and running, without a clunky wire and/or power adapter.

Sporting a sleek design that easily fits in your pocket, purse or backpack, this 950mAh powerhouse ensures that your Apple Watch stays charged wherever life takes you. Imagine going for a jog, attending a meeting or jetting off on a spontaneous weekend getaway. With this on your keychain or stowed away in a bag, you’ll have peace of mind knowing your Apple Watch will stay powered up and ready for action without needing to carry a heftier charger.

Thanks to its magnetic center ring, you’ll get an incredibly convenient wireless charging experience. The magnet ensures your Apple Watch stays securely in place. Plus, you can even charge the charger itself while it’s charging your Apple Watch. That’s the kind of nifty little touch that makes life simpler and more convenient.

Save on a highly rated keychain Apple Watch charger

This nifty device comes highly rated, earning 4.2 out of 5 stars from verified buyers in the Cult of Mac Deals store. As one user raved, “This pocket-sized charger is so accessible and works great … I carry it in my purse or attach it to my backpack, depending on where I go.”

This wireless charging keychain can juice up all Apple Watch models.

Never risk a low battery again. Grab this Apple Watch wireless charger keychain for just $14.97 for a limited time.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post on the Apple Watch keychain charger on December 4, 2023. We updated the pricing.
